        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="76824" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="76824" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.24</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1837">1,837</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="492"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Sweet Tooth</b> by <b>Sabrina Carpenter</b> is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Sweet Tooth</b> was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Gil Clavien. Top notes are Marshamallow, Chocolate, Candied Ginger and Bergamot; middle notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Coconut Milk and Jasmine; base notes are Whipped Cream, Sugar, Musk and Cashmere Wood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Carpenter's first leading role was in the 2019 movie <em>The Short History of the Long Road</em>, which premiered at The Tribeca Film Festival, while her roles also include <em>Girl Meets World</em> and <em>The Hate U Give</em>. She recently signed to Island Records, where she released new singles' Skin', 'Skinny Dipping,' and 'Fast Times,' with a studio album set to get out in 2022. In addition to her growing list of acting and music credits, she was selected for Forbes' prestigious "30 Under 30" list in 2022.</p>

<p>"We are excited to launch Sabrina Carpenter's first fragrance to the market, furthering our commitment to bring consumers worldwide the most culturally relevant fragrances," said Steve Mormoris, founder and CEO of Scent Beauty, the company that will launch the celebrity's new scent. This company is also responsible for <strong>From Above</strong> by Dolly Parton and <strong>Loved</strong> by Lauren Conrad.</p>

<p>The gourmand fragrance is made to evoke the irresistible joy of a candy shop, filled with creamy chocolate, pops of color, swirls, and sweets, as evidenced by the promotional images. "Sweet innocence meets seduction in an exploration of scent" is how the brand promotes it.</p>

<p>"Creating my own fragrance has always been a dream," said the American pop star.</p>

<p>"Everyone knows that I have a serious sweet tooth, which was the inspiration for the scent. It's sweet yet sophisticated, with notes of ginger, marshmallow, coconut milk, sugared musks, and Chantilly cream. I can't wait to share this fragrance with my fans."</p>

<p>Top: Sparkling Bergamot, Candied Ginger, Chocolate Marshmallow<br />
Middle: Jasmine Petals, Coconut Milk, Madagascar Vanilla<br />
Bottom: Cashmere Wood, Chantilly Cream, Sugared Musks</p>

<p>A full-size Eau de Parfum will launch in September 2022 in the shape of a bar of pink chocolate. Sweet and petite, the bottle is modeled from the shape of a chocolate bar but reinvented in faceted glass with tones of pink and rose gold. The bottle sparkles with delight and becomes an art piece for all to unwrap and experience</p>

                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    </div>
                    Strong bergamot note
                </div>

                    Overpowering ginger note

<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/17449/news.17449-120x120.jpg" alt="FRAGRANTICA Editors Favorite Perfumes of 2022" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/FRAGRANTICA-Editors-Favorite-Perfumes-of-2022-17449.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>FRAGRANTICA Editors Favorite Perfumes of 2022</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Nayeli Cano</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            12/08/22 11:02
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">11</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="76824"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.54</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="76824"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>1.62</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2354604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354604" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="inslumber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2312106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="inslumber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354604ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354604" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2312106">inslumber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732056632" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just smell sweet bergamot on my skin. It's kinda similar to Byredo's Bal'd'frique. Thought it will be a sweet gourmand but it's kind of fresh, airy with sweetness. Disappointed for sure</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2354604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2354604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351551" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bourcet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1090870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bourcet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-Candy-Rock-Sugar-42-92258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar | 42"title="Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar | 42"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090870">bourcet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 22:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I put this on before going to bed and thought it was a nope. Felt flat, thin, missing something. I lamented in my head all that I had hoped for this fragrance and all that I thought it could be: a celeb cheapy that’s actually amazing? Could she have her own Cloud moment? Could she revolutionize this gourmand fascination the entire fragrance sphere is having?  Will this disappoint?<br />
<br />
As I wrote the review in my head, Gil Clavien’s chemistry was busy doing its thing. What went from a very one dimensional scratch and sniff sticker unfolded into a gentle, yielding cousin of Warm Vanilla Sugar. I wished the cream was full fat instead of 2%, the marshmallow a bit hollow and sugar air spun, but together these notes do harmonize and do so well. <br />
<br />
I would prefer this fragrance to have more sex appeal to be more Sabrina Carpenter outro than Disney child, but for what this fragrance is, I don’t hate it. <br />
<br />
Do you need this fragrance if you have all the other sugary heavy hitters? No, you don’t, but the bottle is unique enough that you might want that for your collection alone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2351551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2351551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351477" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gemini_queen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2325691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gemini_queen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351477ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351477" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2325691">gemini_queen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 19:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume, I wear it almost everyday!!! My very first impression of it was interesting- when I first sprayed it, I immediately smelled Bath &amp; Body works warm vanilla sugar, and I felt a hint of disappointment that this would be just another basic vanilla perfume. Oh, was I wrong!! There are so many lovely layers in this one. Sometimes the initial top note varies between a warm, sweet vanilla or a fresh candied ginger/citrus note. The notes that are revealed on the dry down are lovely: cream, and warm whipped sugar. The base note that is always left on my skin at the end of the day is delicious chocolate! I do wish it was stronger, it only has about 2 hours of longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2351477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2351477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347828" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jelzbth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2321805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2321805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jelzbth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2321805">jelzbth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm no perfume expert by any means. I was looking for something new and sweet for fall/winter and I decided to try this one out. SB is an adorable girl but I wish they had put a little more umph in this one! I detect lots of vanilla, a little sugar, and maybe a little jasmine. It is way too underwhelming for me, as I do love a good "slap ya in the face" perfume. This isn't a WOW THAT SMELLS GREAT scent, its more like a please, please, please don't charge me $30 for a scent I can get for $2 with a vanilla body spray type scent. (see what i did there) Doesn't smell bad by any means but definitely disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2347828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2347828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="infble"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2313736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="infble" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313736">infble</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 15:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely the sweetest and cutest Sabrina fragrance. I mostly smell marshmallows, sugar and a hint of ginger/bergamot which makes it more airy and fresh and provides a nice balance for the more gourmand notes. I don’t get the dark chocolate at all, in fact, I actually smell a pretty prominent white chocolate accord, maybe from the whipped cream? It’s not too complex of a fragrance, but overall, it’s a very nice blend. It feels very yummy, cozy and fluffy, perfect for fall and winter if you’re into sweet fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2346826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2346826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2346557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346557" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellsgemini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314674.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellsgemini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674">hellsgemini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love sweet scents, so this was kind of a no brainer for me. I blind bought all three perfumes from the Sweet Tooth collection and this one is by far my favorite. I think the notes listed are pretty accurate, except the chocolate and ginger, which I don't pick up on at all. Whenever I first tried it out, all I could think of was how much it reminded me Cloud by Ariana Grande. I looked at the notes and compared the two, and I think it is the musk/whipped cream/coconut combination that I was picking up on from both of them. They both have a sort of clean sugary sweetness to them that I really enjoy. <br />
<br />
While I do like this fragrance, I don't think I will be repurchasing when it runs out. It doesn't last long enough on me or project as far as I would like it to. Given the price, I figured that would be the case. It's not bad, it just doesn't fit what I want out of a scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2346557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2346557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345692" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mangosoda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2148689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mangosoda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148689">mangosoda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 15:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well, it's a simple one. The first spray ALWAYS makes me sneeze, and it gives me a very sickly sweet marshmallow which made me worry about my blind buy, but it dries down into something much nicer, but sadly I pick up very little vanilla from it, more of a general 'sweet', really. It didn't blow me away, and I don't think I will ever rebuy it, but I am enjoying it while my bottle lasts. The longevity isn't great, and the projection is just alright.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2345692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2345692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344771" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Poppiie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2318450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2318450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Poppiie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2318450">Poppiie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only like gourmand sweet scents. You would think a perfume that is a gourmand and is named “sweet tooth” it would be in fact sweet but it’s not for me. <br />
It smells like straight up musky mature old lady powdered stale donuts. Im just not a fan of powder. My noise is very sharp and I can pick up anything. The amount of times I’ve smelled sweet scents and picked up “pickles” is ridiculous lol. <br />
Where’s the marshmallows? The vanilla or coconut? Sugar? The notes sound perfect. However I am returning this perfume because I am disappointed unfortunately and cannot stand it :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2344771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2344771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344451" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hotbaby1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1634988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hotbaby1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-55805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634988">hotbaby1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 12:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This and philosophy fresh cream warm cashmere smell identical. But I much prefer FCWC in the drydown, it’s a true sweet vanilla lightly woody. Longevity of ST is bad, it lasts about 1 hour, whereas the other one lasts about 4 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2344451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2344451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341461" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MangoesandPeaches1!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296998"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2296998.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MangoesandPeaches1!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296998">MangoesandPeaches1!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a nice perfume. In the beginning it smells very prominently of vanilla, cashmere, and marshmallow. On my skin I do not get any candied ginger or chocolate. But overall smells delicious.<br />
 For the price point the longevity and projection is as expected, fades quick. Like VERY quickly. I sprayed a generous amount on my skin and an hour or so later it was barely detectable on my skin. I have body mists that have better longevity.....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2341461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2341461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; it's soft , girly , and cozy . just too musky and synthetic for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2340764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2340764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="majkaelaholt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2235621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="majkaelaholt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dossier/Fruity-Almond-73740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fruity Almond"title="Fruity Almond"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235621">majkaelaholt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 07:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had this perfume for a couple months now, and it's actually what started my perfume "collection". This is my all time FAVORITE perfume, it's soooo cozy and delicious smelling, I can't stop sniffing myself every time I put it on. If the EOS vanilla cashmere lotion was a perfume, this would be it. It's a perfect fluffy, marshmallow, vanilla, chocolate, musky, cashmere perfume. Even though I love it, I almost never grab for it when getting ready because I find it's longevity and sillage isn't as good as some of my other perfumes. But with that being said, I spray it on at least three or four different times as I'm lounging at home or before bed because I find the smell so cozy and comforting. It's also easy to layer, I use it with the Sand + Fog Pistachio Dream parfum oil a lot as it just enhances it's yumminess. I'd say if your looking for a cheaper cozy and yummy smelling perfume, this is a perfect choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2340759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2340759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My only problem is it lacks longevity. I try to combine it with the matching body mist but that only helps a little. This would be one of my signatures if it lasted longer :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2337732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2337732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335746" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bblanka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bblanka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073235">bblanka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>opening is almost exactly like choco musk from al rehab ( the spray version) but after a couple minutes sweet tooth gets softer like a creamy marshmallow / white chocolate and choco musk is more like dark chocolate with spice , still they are quite similar. sweet tooth definitely reminds me of childhood, it’s very comforting but not childish. however it’s quite short lasting and there is this sort of plastic like smell to it which i hope will go away with time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702904">giuliatrapletti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>not a sweet/gourmand fan, but this one is not too bad. to my nose it opens up with a sort of nutty accord then develops into quite a soft, powdery vanilla with a hint of marshmallows. listen up, is it a masterpiece? no. but it’s still enjoyable. it’s not too sweet or cloying (so far). i got this because I really love the rose&amp;mallow shower mousse (if you’re in the uk you know) and someone said they smell similar…I do see the similarity but Sweet tooth is definitely much sweeter &amp; powdery, whereas rose&amp;mallow is more “clean” and milky. overall I would not repurchase this again but if you are a gourmand lover go for it. <br />
side note the bottle is SO cute</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2335725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2335725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It just makes the disappointment of sweet tooth that much more obvious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2332470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2332470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941468">daydreamings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>was my signature scent for some time. to me it opened slightly spicy at first but becomes a super sweet, creamy gourmand. it's very complimented (particularly by men if that's what you're into) and i've been told it's a very unique scent. i personally love it, but it is so difficult to get your hands on!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331184" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rrileymcdonald"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273956"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rrileymcdonald" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331184ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331184" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273956">Rrileymcdonald</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 05:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>blind buy at TJ Maxx. I bought it with a few other fragrances thinking it be my least favorite as I'm not much of a gourmand girly... it turned out to be my favorite. its super light, creamy, sweet and comforting to me. I wear it almost every night for bed time. it kind of gives me a "your skin but better" vibe as far as a gourmand goes. also... i mean the bottle is just so cute. I'm really happy with this one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2331184"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2331184#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329380" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siv7Stars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.47621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siv7Stars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Fire-At-Will-70289.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70289.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fire At Will"title="Fire At Will"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47621">Siv7Stars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 12:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like cross between Prada Candy Sugar Pop and Candy Kiss. Fluffy white floral, marshmallow, subtle citrus n musk. No chocolate or caramel for me, but I like it's lightness, also kind of a toned down Dolce&amp;Gabbana pour Femme. The very slight mismatch between the plastic bottle cap &amp; the glass bottle is a constant annoyance, yet at the same time, given the different mediums, I am impressed they got the pink shade so close!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2329380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2329380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328829" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lamb with an addiction"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2265192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lamb with an addiction" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265192">Lamb with an addiction</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 21:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite celebrity perfume I have tried so far, and for a few reasons. First of all, this lasts on my skin for almost 5 hours, which is a lot longer than I expected from a 30 dollar perfume. Second of all, this does not smell alcoholic whatsoever, but rather, it smells very gourmand even when initially spraying it. The way the scent transitions reminds me of Choco Musk from Al-Rehab; It starts off more spicy and becomes this beautiful, sweet gourmand fragrance. However, the thing I like most about this perfume is its versatility. A lot of the time with gourmand fragrances, they’re usually too cloying to wear past the colder months. But this is the first gourmand perfume I’ve purchased that works perfect year-round. Overall, this fragrance is good for the gourmand lovers who want a light fragrance that still lasts—it smells like a marshmallow, vanilla and citrus dream.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2328829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2328829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328812" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caulicake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2238116.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caulicake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238116">caulicake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 21:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Price reflects it's actual value. I understand what they were going for but it's so cheap-smelling that it actually comes off as cold, uncomplex, and plasticky. I will admit that even though I'm not a fan of it, it's still a step up from a bath and body works body spray. I would recommend as a budget buy, but if you can upgrade you should upgrade. The longevity and projection isn't bad and the perfume itself isn't offensive.<br />
<br />
Also, I do not understand why only the cap of this bottle is plastic. If you're going to try to make the bottle look homogeneous at least keep the same material for both halves. Maybe I'm just nitpicking but when the perfume itself smells like plastic do not exacerbate it with a plastic cap. Sometimes I can't tell if the plasticky smell I'm getting is coming from the perfume itself or from the cap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2328812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2328812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325120" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325120" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="star.daydream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="star.daydream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-Eau-de-Parfum-88083.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88083.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk Eau de Parfum"title="Choco Musk Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325120ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325120" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324081">star.daydream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 11:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft, cozy, and fluffy vanilla marshmallow. What a delightful surprise this one was to me. I thought I was going to hate it but it grow on me very quickly. Initial blast you get ginger, bergamot, vanilla, and a hint of chocolate. The dry down gets very warm and cozy with the whipped cream, cashmere wood, coconut milk, and vanilla. Overall, the image is a cashmere hot chocolate with mini marshmallows. Similar family to Philosophy's fresh cream and warm cashmere and choco musk by Al-Rehab. Philosophy's I find not as sweet and more woody and much prefer this one. Choco Musk is more chocolatey and definitely has more musk but I love them both. I blasted through this 1oz so quickly that I will purchase the full size once done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2325120"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2325120#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324946" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ivchoputkimaini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2035660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2035660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ivchoputkimaini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); Not only are the bottles plastic but they smell just like their price-extremely cheap. They last under 1 hour before they become a skin scent which you'll need to bury your nose in someones neck so you can just smell a little bit of it. Horrible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2324946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2324946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464376">Dinaina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 03:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking at the notes, one would assume that this is very sweet and very gourmand but actually this smells clean?? Like a fresh clean vanilla, not sure if I like it or not, but I expected something totally different🤷🏻♀️</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2324650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2324650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sweet2mechii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114962"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1114962.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sweet2mechii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114962">sweet2mechii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 08:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be honest, this was a blind buy because the cute bottle. <br />
<br />
I expected it to be sickly sweet, but I was pleasantly surprised. It smells of light creamy vanilla, marshmallow and browned sugar in a inoffensive way. Maybe this is as sweet as you can go without it being absolutely nauseating. <br />
<br />
Overall, I am satisfied with the purchase. On my skin it smells like a vanilla lotion, like one of the special edition ones from DM, which for me is actually a plus because I love such light fragrances. <br />
The longevity is... okay, it's terrible - closer to a body mist than a perfume, but what should we expect from a cheap, fun little thing?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316109" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nemophila"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nemophila" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026522">nemophila</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 01:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For some reason this smells super nostalgic to me. It kind of reminds me of the sugary body sprays I would have as a kid, or some kind of vanilla body scrub or lotion. Initially I can smell the bergamot and chocolate but it dries down to more of a powdery, sweet vanilla - I can see how it would smell like marshmallow, but I don't think I would have gotten it if not for the description. For the price it's a good scent and the bottle is cute and unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2316109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2316109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315674" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="plutocean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2244216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="plutocean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314849" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pizzapiee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1891599"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pizzapiee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2314849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2314849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309327" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PINKCAT17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2115056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PINKCAT17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nemat-International/Musk-Amber-43542.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43542.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musk Amber"title="Musk Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115056">PINKCAT17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yummy linear scent and definitely a cozy scent i like this <br />
