padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308876" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kedamonokta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2253208.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kedamonokta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253208">Kedamonokta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 09:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Short and Simple - Sweet Tooth by Sabrina Carpenter - Reviewed 10/8/24<br />
<br />
Being the sort of person I am meant that seeing countless videos on this fragrance influenced me to purchase it as quickly as I could possibly get my hands on a bottle. If there is nobody easily influenced in this world, know that I have probably passed on. regardless of this the chance to have a perfume that was promised as a sweet gourmand that smells of marshmallows for as little as thirty or so dollars piqued my interest, even if I don't end up loving it the packaging alone is enough for me to want it as a decorative piece for my fluffy pink apartment.<br />
<br />
As for the actual scent itself, it fulfills its promise of being a sweeter vanilla sort of fragrance. Very light on all notes which makes it seem fluffy in a girly sort of way. In a lot of reviews people tout that marshmallow note being heavier than I find it to be, to me this is sweet in a baby powder sort of way rather than a candy way, I don't get the ginger or chocolate at all. <br />
An ambiguously sweet but not disagreeable scent would be my way of quickly summing it up, I don't love nor hate it. It doesn't last long on my skin, so it doesn't linger enough to make a real impression in my mind.<br />
This would be a great scent for someone who may be on the younger side, like a little sister perhaps, or just if you're looking for something that isn't particularly mature that won't break your bank.<br />
<br />
That being said in terms of celebrity fragrance this is one of good quality in comparison to others that might come off as overly cheap or synthetic. Just cash grabs. At least this seems to have some thought and love put into it, and I wouldn't mind trying her two other current fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2308876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2308876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307560" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; however, on my skin, the chocolate notes are really present, which makes up for the warm vanilla sugar-ness to me. It's very marshmallow-forward and sweet, but think musk instead of bakery. I can see this as a good base scent when layering.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2302916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2302916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; marshmallows.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2302711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2302711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301984" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sassa7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.114217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sassa7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Korres/Black-Sugar-63257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Sugar"title="Black Sugar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114217">sassa7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 23:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bbw's warm vanilla sugar is fresher to me due to the white orchid and it's more dimensional than this. I don't get the hype at all. Right off the bat it's the scent of cocoa butter lotion mainly the one from the body shop back in the day which I cannot relate to a perfume scent because it was a body butter and the smell is just too plain and flat for me and more appropriate for lotions in my mind due to how basic it is. This is what the chocolate paired with the vanilla sugar marshmallow whipped cream is giving, cheap cocoa butter body lotion. No depth in this to me or perfume quality, but for ppl who don't associate this smell with cocoa butter body care, I suppose it's a nice gourmand, cozy offering. For me personally that's all Sweet Tooth is to me, cocoa butter lotion - and then I saw the chocolate in the notes and it explains it. I don't smell bergamot or candied ginger btw. As soon as I tested it I was disappointed. Fragrantica btw needs to update their webpage somehow cuz it makes all my devices freeze or being slow on their overloaded page.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2301984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2301984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300769" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="summervanilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="summervanilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Pumpkin-Cupcake-75154.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75154.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pumpkin Cupcake"title="Pumpkin Cupcake"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691326">summervanilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 22:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this scent, but it is so incredibly weak. I have many body sprays that are stronger than this. On me, it is like a gourmand, creamy, marshmallow vanilla, with a woody background. If it was stronger, it would be one of my very favorites. It doesn't remind me of Eilish or B&amp;BW Warm Sugar Vanilla AT ALL. The only thing they share is they are all vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2300769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2300769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639807">Jlbeauty.reviews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 20:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so confused when I first sprayed it because I hadn't heard anyone say this was a citrus gourmand. But I was relieved to see that there was bergamot in the top notes and I wasn't crazy. That only lasts a few minutes and after I'm left with a super sweet marshmallow cupcake like vanilla with whipped cream. It's also very light-wearing. I really love this for bedtime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2299572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2299572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Para me gusto me encantaría que oliera más a chocolate ya que realmente se le siente muy abajo.Para las que viven en latinoamerica me recuerda un poco a Egeo Choc de Oboticario (luego los compararé lado a lado para decirles). Es un aroma bastante suave pero no se pierde, siento que con una buena cantidad dejaría estela. Me huele tambien un poco a el olor de una tienda aca en Colombia que se llama Koaj, pero mucho menos intenso, no es identico solo me lo recuerda un poco. 100% se siente atalcado o polvoso pero no demasiado. primero esta el malvavisco con sensación atalcada y luego si todos los demás aromas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294511" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="veraciousvices"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2226610.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="veraciousvices" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294511ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294511" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226610">veraciousvices</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First, I love the bottle. It is so cute, and it’s got some heft. As for the juice, I get purely sweet, creamy, marshmallow fluff. I think it smells great, but it doesn’t last super long on me, and I never really get the notes in the dry down, just the opening sweet marshmallow.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2294511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2294511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294156" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="juxtapositionjones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1066682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1066682.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="juxtapositionjones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294156ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294156" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1066682">juxtapositionjones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 19:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I collect perfumes, primarily for the bottles. So obviously I had to have this for my collection. I'm a middle aged woman and have no idea who Sabrina is.<br />
The bottle is quality and does not disappoint. <br />
The nectar inside is nothing new or ground breaking.<br />
It is, however, a scented journey into the wonderful experience of vanilla. <br />
Sweet at first. Sweet vanilla. Maybe a touch of sugar in that. It's too vanilla to be marshmallows.<br />
Dry down is pure warm vanilla. Very warm. And it's vanilla. Not powdery, not floral, not musky, not woody.<br />
It's vanilla warmed in a saucepan on a cook top.<br />
Lasted all day on my skin.<br />
In summary,  it's delightfully packaged, slightly sweet, warm vanilla. It's gorgeous</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2294156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2294156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293353" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="User558i"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2207490"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="User558i" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Celeste-64788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Celeste"title="Celeste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2207490">User558i</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 04:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It gets stronger, give it a couple months, or a different season. When I bought it at the start of summer I could barely smell it, I thought it was weak. Now, almost 4 months later, it’s way stronger and sweeter. I’m glad I didn’t return it right away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2293353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2293353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293059" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PeachyKeen72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PeachyKeen72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253212">PeachyKeen72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 19:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(Full disclosure, I bought this perfume mainly for the bottle, but also to see how it smells on me lol.)<br />
<br />
The first spray made me think of mandarin oranges but in a very strong, citrus way, not sweet mandarin. I'm guessing that's the bergamot/ginger component, but also maybe its what others are experiencing as strong alcohol? That dies down pretty quickly. I'm getting no chocolate. Like, my Too Faced Bon Bon pallet from 2014 smells more like chocolate than this. Also, I'm not getting much jasmine or coconut milk, but that might be just how it works on my skin. I do get marshmallow, which is not over powering sweet for me personally, but I can see it being a bit much for someone who isn't into sugary scents. A bit woodsy at the end there, which unfortunately is at about hour in. <br />
<br />
 All that being said, Sweet Tooth reminds me of Basic Vanilla from Victoria's Secret! I'm not upset about it, actually, it makes me like it more! It's just not as spicy I think. This perfume is creamy, soft, and sweet. I want to try layering it with lavender or a true vanilla~ The main disappointment here is the longevity for me. Another nit pick is that the plastic cap is more matte compared to the glass bottle. But at the end of the day, this cute pink chocolate bar sitting on my shelf makes my inner child happy &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2293059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2293059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292234" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="witch_x3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="witch_x3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jessica-Simpson/Fancy-4094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fancy"title="Fancy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2292234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2292234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thescapologist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382318"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382318.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thescapologist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382318">thescapologist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 07:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this so much.  I sampled it first, and immediately after trying it for a day, I knew I had to get the bottle.  It's truly the fluffy, creamy scent I've been looking for!  I wouldn't really call it straight vanilla - instead, the whipped cream, ginger and marshmallow notes are very prominent in this one.  Starts off bright (probably from the bergamot) and slightly spicy from the ginger, then settles down into something warm and cozy.  Honestly, it's good to wear at any time, but will probably shine in the cooler months.  The longevity on skin isn't the greatest (but not as bad as it could be), and once sprayed on my clothes, I do get whiffs throughout the day, which is good enough for me, especially with the price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2288054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2288054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A very soft fragrance. The vanilla and jasmine heart works very well. Cashmere and musk base is also very beautiful. Suitable for year round wear. <br />
<br />
Not much of the bergamot or the candied ginger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2287870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2287870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277727" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chloerose666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1950146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chloerose666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Remember-Me-49435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Remember Me"title="Remember Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277727ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277727" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146">Chloerose666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 02:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>she is a sweet, inoffensive, whipped cream, sugary sweet marshmallow bomb. It smells like the body spray So...? Vanilla Candy ('designed for layering') and does indeed layer well with it and last a reasonably long time.<br />
<br />
Obviously its a celeb perfume, relatively cheap, I wasn't expecting too much but I'm aware it has a large following so was hoping for something exactly like I got<br />
<br />
sweet, vanilla, marshmallow sugar. does what it says on the tin. I am sensitive to chemically smelling frags and I don't get chemicals from this, on opening or dry-down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2277727"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2277727#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Morpheuse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2204694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Morpheuse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204694">Morpheuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 08:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice gourmand, inoffensive, very one-note tho. Doesn't change or evolve at all. It's missing a little something to make it a WOW. One person described it very well as a kinda melty white chocolate with cream. It doesn't project much at all. Might be good for layering? Somebody might try if they haven't yet, cause I probably won't buy this one xD</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2276912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2276912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hysteria1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hysteria1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Yara-Candy-95752.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95752.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yara Candy"title="Yara Candy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331">hysteria1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 12:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This immediately reminded me first of Eilish 1 (The gold one) and then of Al Rahab -Soft perfume oil, a sort of rich vanilla envelops you for the first minute and then a kind of sweet citrus kicks in for an overall sweet and fun scent.<br />
<br />
I pick up no chocolate or coconut notes but maybe thats just on my skin, definite vanilla and bergamot with a little whipped cream and a little musk thrown in for good measure. <br />
<br />
It definitely lacks in projection and longevity, really enjoy the playful packaging, the abismal lasting power aside this is a nice little perfume at a really good price.<br />
<br />
If you're looking for sophisticated gourmand this isnt it,  but for the price its worth picking up even the 30ml to try and then throw in a handbag for a night out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aquapinkmoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1809463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aquapinkmoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/My-Burberry-Blush-45820.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45820.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Burberry Blush"title="My Burberry Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463">Aquapinkmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just purchased the body mist for only $10, it’s lovely BUT reminded me very strongly of something I already have in my collection, it smells almost exactly like ‘warm vanilla sugar’ by bath and body works. This is a heck of a lot cheaper though, and great for layering with other fragrances to amp up or add to any sweetness. Its very marshmallow and vanilla forward on my skin but I do get a blast of ginger upon initial spray, for $10 you can’t go wrong, I will say, the longevity and siliage is verryyyyyy poor but that makes this perfect for anyone sensitive to strong smells. I’d say get this for layering, as a gift for a child/teen or as a scent to wear if you work in close knit offices or planes :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2273090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2273090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271685" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jasminejjj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2243511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jasminejjj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243511">Jasminejjj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The moment I opened this (blind buy) was the moment I told myself I was returning this as soon as the post office reopened. It smelled like straight Glade bathroom spray. Tried it again &amp; hated it even more. IDK what happened but 2 days later I was just in the mood to smell it again. And I’ve been OBSESSED ever since!! It’s a powdery white chocolate bar that’s softening but not melting, &amp; getting milkier the longer you wear it. I wear it over Choco Musk Fragrance oil to make it last longer. You must really have a SWEET TOOTH to appreciate this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2271685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2271685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268941" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pastrypuff34"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216913"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pastrypuff34" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268941ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268941" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216913">pastrypuff34</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 06:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>sweet tooth is a very sweet, almost thick, powdery gourmand. it’s gorgeous, definitely reminiscent of fresh cream warm cashmere from philosophy, but with less of the woody background that philosophy has. it doesn’t smell like fresh, powdery marshmallows, but closer to a sticky sweet, chocolatey marshmallow. pairs well with other phrases, but can be a bit cloying, especially in hot weather. not for summer, but a great gourmand for every other season!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2268941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2268941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267333" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pure Morning"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1620736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pure Morning" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Gris-Dior-48387.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48387.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Dior"title="Gris Dior"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267333ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267333" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620736">Pure Morning</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 14:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla marshmallow with 1-2h longevity. Its good for teens and little girls. I sprayed it on my arms then went to my bathroom and it became weird from the steam (i was tidying up my bathroom; have not washed it off from my body yet). So I assume its better for colder weather or dry climate. I don’t recommend it for summer heat or humid climate. When sniffing it from the bottle there is this slight soapy note (i like that, but it disappeared on my skin) - maybe it will layer good with white musk fragrances. For celebrity scent is nice, but I think Ariana Grandes fragrances are a bit more quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2267333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2267333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However, you could try layering it for stronger projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2266752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2266752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265184" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265184" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Strawbunnee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868586.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Strawbunnee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265184ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265184" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868586">Strawbunnee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wasn't going to buy this one because some say it's a dupe of Philosophy's Fresh Cream Warm Cashmere--which I **despised**. I ended up buying Sweet Tooth when I saw a 75mL bottle being sold for $30 at Marshall's. After spraying, I immediately realized it smelled VERY similar to something I've had before...and that was B&amp;BW's Warm Vanilla Sugar. It's subtle and fades within an hour or two, but the bottle is just adorable. Not sure if I'll ever be wearing this one out, but I will for sure be using it to cozy up before bed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2265184"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2265184#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264073" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="b3nedite"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1771849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="b3nedite" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); I liked it however, it smelt like alcohol at first. I can smell the sweetness. I really wanted to like this fragrance. I do but, it had a soapy smell mixed in. I don’t know if I will buy a bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2264073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2264073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="microwaveproofcat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="microwaveproofcat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896881">microwaveproofcat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is a wonderful piece of work. It is definitely sweet and heavy in vanilla, but it still carries a complexity and maturity not often found in sugary scents. The woody, musky notes in the base compliment the sugary sweet body so well, and despite the controversial nature of powdery notes being present in perfumes, I feel like it works very well with this fragrance. The ginger adds a bit of spice that works well with the muskiness without over powering the sweetness. The scent itself unfortunately doesn't have much longevity or projection, but the retail price is basically that of a body mist so I won't complain. It can last all day when paired with a good lotion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2263931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2263931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261272" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261272" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jude_the_dude"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2231838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jude_the_dude" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Musc-Noir-For-Her-64730.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64730.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Noir For Her"title="Musc Noir For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261272ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261272" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231838">jude_the_dude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 03:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i honestly bought the mini version of this perfume just because i thought it looked cute. i totally expected not to enjoy it. upon first spray, i couldn't say it was really my taste. a bit too sugary and not enough of the other notes off the top. but later that day, and i mean wayy later, i sniffed my jacket and it smelled divine and i couldn't figure out what it was until i remembered that i used this perfume! the marshmallow note! it doesn't show up for a while, but when it does it hits so hard! lasts on my clothes for ages! my go to perfume for winter mornings. i layer it with any basic musk to bring out it's own musk note. sometimes i also layer it with a bit of black opium to make it a bit warmer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2261272"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2261272#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The smell is like an air refreshener.<br />
<br />
Superr disappointed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2260166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2260166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259577" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259577" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iveta IBM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1679061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iveta IBM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259577ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259577" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679061">Iveta IBM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oooh cutecutecute, like a hug in a bottle.<br />
The moment I smelled this I was sure it reminded me of something that I either already own or have owned before. At first I thought it's VS Tease Creme Cloud (because of the whipped cream, I guess?) but then I read the reviews here and it hit me: I used to have the Warm Vanilla Sugar body cream from BBW, and it smelled EXACTLY like this. And I'm not saying it like it's a bad thing, I love Warm Vanilla Sugar.<br />
I might buy this, after all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2259577"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2259577#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vintage.doll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1010369.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vintage.doll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Pistachio-Gelato-33-79846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33"title="Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010369">vintage.doll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine pure vanilla extract, tempered by a bit of cashmere with powdery marshmallow and hot chocolate. I didn’t have high expectations since  I’ve smelled so many failure vanillas in the recent past, but I loved all the notes listed in sweet tooth and the body mist smelled divine. I can’t describe how in love I was when I sprayed this on my wrist in the Walmart parking lot.. I’ve gotten more compliments wearing this than any other perfume ever, which shocked me because I bought it for $30 on a whim in Walmart. Random men will tell me how good I smell. Although it’s similar to choco musk and warm cash it’s not a dupe for either. Note, this is neutral, leaning cool, powdery vanilla. If you want a deeper spicier scent, get the caramel dream.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2255655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2255655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erialc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2146861.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erialc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146861">erialc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 23:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume for the price, it has the same sweetness as Ariana Sweet like Candy but less fruity and more marshmallowy and creamy. The opening is pure alcohol (and makes me sneeze every time) but the dry down is delicious and creamy. My biggest complaint is that it has horrible longevity and projection which is so disappointing as I love the scent. I only use this to layer as it is way too weak to wear by itself, and even then I have to spray about 10 times</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2254837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2254837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
