edit: i was gifted this for my birthday, and i think you have to give this perfume a couple of months to get to that creamy marshmallow scent... right now it smells very heavy and makes me nauseous</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2254076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2254076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252170" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TotallyAverageUSA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/100400"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.100400.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TotallyAverageUSA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/100400">TotallyAverageUSA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well color me juvenile and vulgar and I could care LESS - this fragrance is TDF (to die for) gorgeous and I am HERE for it! This is SO. GOOD. I wish they made gallon-sized bottles - an ounce will be gone way, way too quickly for me, I'm afraid. Sweet Tooth is everything you think it will be based on the name, bottle, and a cursory look at the notes. 100% edible, undeniably feminine, totally FUN - lighthearted - carefree - girly - delicious. YUM.<br />
Performance = Moderate+ on all points (sillage, projection, longevity). <br />
<br />
Edited to add: PS the only thing I don't like is the opacity of the bottle (not sheer at ALL) so I can't see how much fluid is inside. It's not a deal breaker, I just wish they made all perfume bottles transparent though. <br />
<br />
Edited again on 9/7/2024: You CAN see the fill-level of this bottle if you hold it up to a bright light source, the light will allow you to see what's inside, so yay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2252170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2252170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jadesfragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jadesfragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495358">jadesfragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 06:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i've wanted to try this since it fell onto my radar but couldn't for the life of me find it anywhere to test, so i eventually caved and just blind bought it. the notes are right up my street - i love vanilla, marshmallow, whipped cream and chocolate in scents (i'm a sucker for anything gourmand), but reading some reviews had me a bit dubious in terms of longevity, with a few mentioning it smells chemical / alcoholic.<br />
at the price point i figured i had nothing to lose and i'm SO glad i just went for it. i don't get any chemical, plastic, cheap-y vibes from it at all, for me it's suuuper sweet - i get all of those gourmand notes, with a powdery, vanilla marshmallow standing out the most, drying into creamy, chocolatey coziness. although it is super sweet, it doesn't feel too juvenile. just very wearable, very comforting and a definite compliment-getter.<br />
i've not tested it enough to comment much on the longevity yet - though it seems to perform well on my skin, but at the end of the day, for a celeb fragrance at this price point, i feel like it's justified.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2250130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2250130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249780" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
The packaging is so cute, but the juice is disgusting. I felt so cheap and abhorrent in this perfume. Huge letdown. I adore Sabrina, but this is not it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2246803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2246803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s like your everyday, run-of-the-mill sweet fragrance. A typical celebrity scent with nothing new, no ingenuity going for it at all. The packaging is cute and is about all that it’s got going for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2244610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2244610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Parffinpuffin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217306"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Parffinpuffin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217306">Parffinpuffin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very light smelling but definitely sweet. To me it is very carmel and marshmallow smell, little bit vanilla. It’s a bit nostalgic in a way for me. It’s like opening a fresh can of coco powder while baking marshmallows and wearing vanilla perfume. All around good, I just wish it would last and be a bit stronger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2244079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2244079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242256" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hyunjinandtonic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201754"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2201754.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hyunjinandtonic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Orange-Bitters-Cologne-2023-87710.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87710.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orange Bitters Cologne (2023)"title="Orange Bitters Cologne (2023)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201754">hyunjinandtonic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I literally couldn’t smell anything. I tested this at a local drugstore and I was really dissapionted, the tester paper had a stronger scent. <br />
<br />
The bottle is so cute and I really hoped I would get a “chocolate cake” scent out of this, but it’s so so so weak.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2242256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2242256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lady Patches"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2025491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lady Patches" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025491">Lady Patches</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is the perfume good? Yes! Dollove it? No. The perfume has low/mild longevity. Is powdery, creamy and sweet.<br />
Has a lot of notes, but for me, it is just like milky chocolate, marshmallows, and whipped cream. The vanilla and coconut are subtle and you can feel the ginger. It is a complex fragrance. l liked using it last Christmas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2239593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2239593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239346" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sombra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/329419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.329419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sombra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-59-88722.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88722.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '59"title="Cheirosa '59"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/329419">Sombra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 04:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is a really nice “base” perfume for many vanilla-fruity-lactonic scents or Ariana Grande’s fragrances as many of them are vanilla-marshmallow-sugar oriented. Specifically, I like layering it with the Sweet like candy, it adds the “missing” berry accord to complete the picture in my opinion, and then this creamy milky sugary note is nicely intensified.<br />
But even wearing on its own is pretty, I do not mind reapplying in a couple of hours when the sillage starts fading as the price point is reasonable. The sugar powder / cotton candy note is the most prominent, it’s really comforting and delicious. I wish there were some fruity note on top of it, but well, this is where layering comes in place.<br />
This scent would not survive long winter by the Northern Europe, but for the rest of the seasons it’ll work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2239346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2239346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I just really wish it had more of a staying power, I only get a couple hours out of it at most.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2239005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2239005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2234668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2234668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232056" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gourmandho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2206538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gourmandho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206538">gourmandho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 14:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The bergamot and candied ginger add so much sweetness and almost fizzyness to the opening of this fragrance. The marshmallow quickly takes over this fragrance while you get some of that smooth chocolate. The ginger and bergamot are still present for the remaining time. The coconut and whipped cream add to the overall creaminess that you have left with as well as, a sugary vanilla skin scent. A sugary bomb that could be a little bit cloying but, I don't mind it at all. If you like this you may like pink sugar however I also pair this with Milk (expressive) by Commodity.<br />
Fragrance - 9.5/10 (depending on how much of a gourmand person you are)<br />
Silage - 9/10<br />
Longevity - 7-8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2232056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2232056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231981" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vicky456"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vicky456" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231981ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231981" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387792">Vicky456</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 12:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby is her new fragrance that needs to be put on here. <br />
Notes are (top) - Cherry Cosmo, Glazed Apple, Apple Plum Nectar, Brown Sugar.<br />
(Middle)- Red Poppy, Peony Blossom, Dark Chocolate. Vanilla Orchid.<br />
(Base)- Cashmere Wood, Sensual Musk, Patchouli Elixir, Amber Resin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2231981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2231981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mariiablackout"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2122756.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mariiablackout" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Rocher/Vanille-Bourbon-2000-5344.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5344.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Bourbon 2000"title="Vanille Bourbon 2000"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122756">Mariiablackout</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-27">07/27/24 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells incredibly cheap and plastic</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2231211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2231211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227326" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ghostori"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2108374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ghostori" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108374">ghostori</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of amazed how light and gentle this fragrance is considering it's a sweet gourmand. You could definitely wear this to work, even in an office. It never became saccharine even in 90F heat and heavy humidity. It's creamy, fluffy, and delicious for any occasion. I wish I could eat it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2227326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2227326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223994" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hollykdenton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176787"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hollykdenton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Cherry-in-the-Air-17129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cherry in the Air"title="Cherry in the Air"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176787">hollykdenton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 00:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved the sound of this, but it has fallen really flat for me. I'm a big fan of loud, sugary vanilla gourmand fragrances, but for some reason this is a little cloying for me. I don't know if it's the musk/cream combination, although that's usually something I like. I usually love basic vanilla fragrances, but I find myself wishing I could smell the bergamot, ginger or cashmere wood in this because it needs the brightness, depth, or anything to stop it from being so devastatingly... mid?? <br />
<br />
It's creamy, sweet, comforting and seems to be well blended. And in a market saturated with sweet vanilla scents, I can't really be upset that this one's just not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2223994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2223994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astrophel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astrophel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kylie-Cosmetics/Cosmic-Kylie-Jenner-90957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cosmic Kylie Jenner"title="Cosmic Kylie Jenner"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180061">astrophel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow I really did not expect to like this perfume at all. I thought this was just going to be another linear sweet fragrance. In reality, the ginger adds a hint of spiciness, it's creamy and a little woody, the chocolate is quite prevalent as well. <br />
<br />
Pros: <br />
- A creamy, vanilla 'mild gourmand' fragrance. <br />
- Very cozy due to the ginger and cashmere.<br />
- Pretty easy to enjoy and love if you are a sweet-fragrance lover. <br />
- Works wonderfully as a layering perfume (I like layering it on top of Mod Vanilla) <br />
- Extremely good value for the smell (was 39 AUD for 75 mL). <br />
- Very creative packaging and surprisingly easy to store in my bag lol <br />
<br />
Cons:<br />
- Not the best performance, medium sillage and okay longevity (about 3-4 hours for me) <br />
- Probably have to wait for perfume to mature for a better performance<br />
- Sometimes I spray it on me and it just...disappears lol <br />
- While amazing notes, can be a little too basic and sweet for some. <br />
<br />
Other thoughts: <br />
- Asked my dad to smell and he said it was masculine lol (?) <br />
- You have to keep reapplying but honestly for the price for some reason I don't mind<br />
- Tbh I will probably keep repurchasing this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2222251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2222251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221802" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kharber1993"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2106649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2106649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kharber1993" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2106649">kharber1993</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 19:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it! This if perfect scent for those who want to smelI girly, sweet, and clean. The beginning smells like pink marshmallows with a hint of chocolate followed by a very clean vanilla. Smells like a girlier version of Billie Eilish, and maybe a sweeter version of yara. Smells exactly like warm vanilla sugar from BBW. I pair this with Gingham Gorgeous, or vanilla cashmere EOS. It doesn’t last long, but at least it’s not expensive. If you pair this with Strawberry pound cake, you’ll have everyone looking for strawberry cup cakes or pancakes and may make the people you work around hangry lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dj71"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721315"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1721315.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dj71" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/XOXO/Mi-Amore-17853.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17853.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mi Amore"title="Mi Amore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721315">dj71</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 16:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like Pink Sugar, you'll like this and you'll probably like this one much better.  Pink Sugar is a bit too much for me, but this one strikes a better balance.  To be clear, these don't smell exactly alike, but they do offer a similar super sweet gourmand experience.  This on is less sharp to my nose than Pink Sugar or the P.S. flankers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2221669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2221669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443158">patriciaclaryce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had high hopes for this but unfortunately the vanilla in this is reminiscent of cheap, plasticky, car freshener vanilla and not the cozy, warm vanilla. The coconut note also stands out for me and is borderlining that fake tan smell which I am not a fan of. I don't detect any chocolate, ginger, jasmine or bergamot. It gets a bit nicer as the 'cheapness' fades but nothing that screams special.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2220689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2220689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220335" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abbiefw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="abbiefw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205811" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gourmandivi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2031229.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gourmandivi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031229">Gourmandivi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 08:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice perfume!! Not sickly sweet, not cheap smelling!! It’s soft and feminine, yummy but smells different from generic celebrity frangrances. I would say the body mist is not worth it since it smells a LOT like alcohol but the perfume is really nice and not expensive at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2205811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2205811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204599" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gibby555"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2100474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gibby555" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100474">gibby555</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally bought this perfume after thinking about it for so long-- I was slightly worried that it might be redundant in my collection because I already have some sweet marshmallow fragrances... but this one is totally unique in its own way. It takes a moment to dry down from the alcohol-y opening. It evolves into a soft and gentle marshmallow, chocolate, ginger, and musky fragrance. I initially expected this perfume to be a lot sweeter (something to the effect of Ari by Ariana Grande), but I actually enjoy the level of sweetness it has. The lack of "in your face" sweetness makes it a bit more mature in my opinion. Overall, a really nice perfume for the price! The only downside for me is the sillage-- you have to get really close to the skin to smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2204599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2204599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203553" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Des96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1905361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Des96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905361">Des96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 23:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did not expect to like this, well actually, I expected to like it but its become a favorite. Initially I was unimpressed when I sprayed it, I got it for 30$ in a gift set. Eh, I stored it in my collection until a few months later. My advice to someone is to let this sit around awhile after spraying it the first time, it gets sweeter. There is however, a little plasticity note at times think powdery pink plastic? Mainly though I get this pink marshmallow but its not super sweet something tones it down, the cocoa or coconut milk? It definitely smells how the bottle looks now. Not fruity, just this warm sweet but oh so cozy scent. Never overpowering or too much. It doesn’t last super well but man…I love it. It does smell very similar to fresh cream warm cashmere from philosophy but I think it’s actually more pleasant, lasts longer, and is a bit more sweet. For 30$ its a great buy, very sweet and girly but she’s not too much. My favorite bedtime scent :) Layer with Ari by Ariana Grande and thank me later<br />
<br />
UPDATE: For those who care, I found a longer lasting dupe of this by Dua called Fluffy Marshmallows, bottle isn’t as cute but again…thank me later lol!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2203553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2203553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203283" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203283" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cecilysmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cecilysmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203283ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203283" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594803">cecilysmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this because of positive reviews on it smelling like marshmallows. It does have a slight marshmallow smell that is washed away with a very strange very salty caramel. More spicy than I imagined based on the notes. Still a good gourmand scent, but you would like this if you like deeper spicier orange-y caramel-y scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2203283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2203283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202726" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PinkGhoulette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1634282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PinkGhoulette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634282">PinkGhoulette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 01:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Originally bought this just to have a perfume I could carry everywhere that wasn't expensive. I've been reaching for this everyday though! It layers really nicely with Carolina Hererra's very good girl. It's sweet without being heavy or too warm. The coconut note helps make this summer appropriate in my opinion (but it could be worn all year round). My only complaint is that it does not last at all. I find myself reapplying every hour or so. For 30 bucks you do get what you pay for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2202726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2202726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Some perfumes have the sort of sweetness that makes you feel incredibly immature but this one has such a perfect sense of warmness that I can't help but feel a little older than I am... my frontal lobe feels formed and everyone tells me I smell like cake.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176531">oliwiakuchar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-26">06/26/24 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first not really sweet, but more powdery, almost undetectable. After macerating, it gained some of white chocolate sweetness and fruity accord to it. Not a typical gourmand, but worth trying. Appreciated by many women, men can’t really detect it from my experience tbh. May appear tacky and inexpensive to people above 30.<br />
Massive con: poor sillage and longevity, even for that price. It lasts about 2 hours, but for 80 minutes out of those 2 hours it runs on a very, very delicate projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2199882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2199882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you have trouble to find this one, you can try Qissa Delicious by Paris Corner it's like 90% similar :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2199856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2199856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196982" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196982" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ck8956"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ck8956" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196982ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196982" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129198">ck8956</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 05:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>probably one of my favourite gourmand fragrances i’ve smelled. its sweet yet mature and isn’t cloying at all, i get a bit of spiciness from the ginger note which i don’t usually love in a perfume however it works really well in this one. the chocolate and vanilla notes are gorgeous, probably the strongest out of them all. decent sillage for a celebrity perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196175" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dinotsarr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173848"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2173848.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dinotsarr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); The packaging is so cute but honestly a bit misleading, because this scent, while not grandma-y, is a lot more mature than you'd expect. It's sweet, not cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2196175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2196175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192197" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emmarose111"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168471"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2168471.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emmarose111" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168471">emmarose111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So sooo yummy. def more gourmand than fruity/floral! good to wear alone but I much prefer to layer sweet tooth with other perfumes to add that sugary note</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2192197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2192197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188876" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joleibae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1981887"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1981887.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joleibae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1981887">joleibae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 03:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this so much. In my opinion, If you've ever been to the Las Vegas Strip's hotels, such as Aria and The Luxor, this is identical to Asian Garden, the scent that the hotels push out. I want to lowkey layer with a tobacco note just for funsies. It's an amazing gourmand that honestly would be great for hotter weather as I personally think that the whipped cream, ginger, and jasmine help it to be a lighter and fresh gourmand. For a budget and beginner fragrance, I love!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2188876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2188876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
