padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149763">gigiamorosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 20:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm writing this with a heavy heart... I bought both Sweet Tooth and Caramel Dream, If you are anosmic (noseblind) to BR540, the chances of you detecting this fragrance are quite slim. As someone who can't detect BR540, I unfortunately, can't smell anything at all with these either. The packaging is incredibly cute though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2182543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2182543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182192" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bv1026"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bv1026" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184254">bv1026</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not really sure why, but to me this smells like skittles. I have a perfume, Love's Eau So Glamorous, that smells similar, except that one is way more fruity but nonetheless smells like skittles. This one is a bit on the sweeter side, but unfortunately I cannot smell marshmallow, chocolate, vanilla, or whipped cream. Which really stinks since I love those scents. Not sure why I smell fruit either since there are none in the notes, perhaps it is the candied ginger. I'm a huge gourmand girly so this was a bummer. I still like it but I just expected more.<br />
<br />
EDIT: It now no longer smells fruity to me, but a soft, sweet scent. I cannot outright smell marshmallows nor do i smell chocolate/whipped cream. I wish I did. Everyone seems to describe it as a marshmallow fragrance but my nose cannot detect it. However it still smells really good. I bought both FCWC and Qissa Delicious and I can say that they all smell similar. FCWC smells most similar to this, but sweeter, and Delicious has more orange and dark chocolate notes to it. Overall it's a good perfume, but it doesn't last as long as I wish it did.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2182192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2182192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love to layer this with my other perfumes to make them more fluffy. It smells like pink marshmallows! It's one of my sweeter perfumes that isn't cloying</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2180128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2180128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cherryfaerie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2131862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cherryfaerie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Mataha/Escapade-Gourmande-72607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escapade Gourmande"title="Escapade Gourmande"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2131862">cherryfaerie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 08:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ve only had this perfume for a few minutes at this point but I am eager to review it. <br />
<br />
First off I have to say the design is adorable but the cap is actually quite cheap. While the part of the chocolate bar design that holds the perfume is heavy and well made, the lid is a piece of cheap flimsy plastic. <br />
<br />
That being said this perfume is very strange to me. It smells like the cheap soap that you use in public restrooms like at a movie theater or hospital. <br />
<br />
As I mentioned earlier I only just got this so hopefully the dry down is more impressive. This wasn’t the delicious gourmand I was looking for.  If you want to smell cheap but also clean go for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2179936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2179936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179514" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179514" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179514ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179514" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 21:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice, basic vanilla scent with a hint of coconut. I don’t get any candied ginger or bergamot. My one complaint is that it’s quite faint and needs to be sprayed a lot to get enough payoff. While faint, it lasts about 6 hours. In terms of perfumes listed as similar—<br />
✔️ BBW Warm Vanilla Sugar: very similar<br />
✔️ Philosophy Fresh Cream Warm Cashmere: very similar, just a bit deeper<br />
✔️ Tru Fragrance Praline &amp; Pistachio: similar but a bit nutty<br />
❌ Al Rehab Choco Musk: no coconut<br />
❌ Cirque du Soleil L’eau de Parfum: a deep, slightly fruity carnival-esque scent<br />
❌ D&amp;G Devotion: a candied lemon scent<br />
❌ Lattafa Eclaire: a honeyed caramel<br />
❌ Lattafa Yara: a tropical fruity scent<br />
❌ Sabrina Carpenter Caramel Dream: has a distinct patchouli note<br />
❌ Tru Fragrance Vanilla Potion: no coconut and has distinct bergamot</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2179514"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2179514#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179033" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Matinieri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1593107.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Matinieri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593107">Matinieri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 12:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do yourself a favor, layer this with Sol de Janeiro 62. It's the most delicious thing! Yes, the smell is basic but I love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2179033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2179033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178379" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cxxxii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2156464.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cxxxii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156464">cxxxii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 23:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>overall; girly, sugary, and cutesie<br />
<br />
the initial spray was a noticeable marshmallow-y scent w/ choco (i couldnt smell the bergamont ?? no issue though) very sweet and airy, fluffy <br />
once tried down it became moreso  sugary (not sickening, like a light sugar, vanilla-y mixed with musk (cashmere)<br />
<br />
i personally adore gourmand scents and cashmere, so this combi is absolutely lovely to me<br />
only gripe is that the sweetness could get slightly overwhelming for certain ppl so  i wouldnt recommend if sweet scents make u sickly 😞</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2178379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2178379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kelhil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kelhil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caffè"title="Amore Caffè"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046">kelhil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 14:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance really surprised me. I'm not usually a strictly gourmand girl, cupcake/frosting/etc scents are usually too synthetic and fake for me, even in candles and room sprays. This isn't really synthetic past the initial spray, where there's a little bit of a plastic-y smell to it. Milky, sweet, marshmallows and sweet cream is how I would describe this. It's not overly complex, I don't really get any chocolate from this, and it's very girly and immature, but not necessarily in a "middle school" way. It's a fun daytime scent for all seasons, in my opinion. My only complaint is longevity, I wish it lasted a lot longer, but I usually get 6 hours of wear from her before I can't smell it anymore. I put up with it because I like the whip cream frosting smell so much lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2175904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2175904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ripgirl9000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1625667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ripgirl9000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625667">ripgirl9000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 17:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, girlie, and fun. Very milky I pick up on sugar cane with hints of vanilla and musk. A sweet perfume, that is great for a younger audience. Definitely a crowd-pleaser and I could see a lot of men loving this scent on a woman. If you are a gourmand lover, I highly recommend Sweet Tooth. And it cannot be beat for the price point.  <br />
The most familiar scent I know is the House of Sillage Minnie Mouse, which is like $395, and I like Sweet Tooth more! So that says something. (Minnie Mouse is more cotton candy sweet which I do not care for).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2173972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2173972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173689" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Safyre365"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Safyre365" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480874">Safyre365</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOOOOOOVE Sweet Tooth! It's a beautiful fluffy marshmallow scent with some other notes just to make it more interesting. <br />
The chantilly cream note is a rockstar in this and elevates it from being plain sugar. This is a gourmand lover's DREAM and one of my favorite marshmallow fragrances! ☁️😋🥰<br />
<br />
I normally don't like ginger in perfumes, but this has candied ginger in the background, so it's quiet &amp; plays nicely! <br />
The chocolate note isn't a dark chocolate either, for those who are wondering. <br />
I don't smell the jasmine or bergamot, thank goodness! Maybe the bergamot is there just to cut the sweetness and little, but I dislike bergamot because it can smell bitter sometimes, so I'm very glad I can't smell the bergamot in this! <br />
This is sugary fluffy marshmallow Heaven to my nose! <br />
<br />
Some people complain about the performance of this, but I get a GOOD scent bubble for a long time when I overspray kinda like a body mist and also spray my clothes! I can smell this on my clothes until I wash them.<br />
<br />
No one is going to smell you with most perfumes with only 2 or 3 sprays, so don't be afraid to use more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2173689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2173689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172035" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BekkyWithTheGoodScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976773"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1976773.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BekkyWithTheGoodScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976773">BekkyWithTheGoodScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 23:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh gosh I was so excited to try this and after finding one that wasn't being sold for a crazy scalper price I purchased. Unfortunately this is waaaay over-hyped or my nose is just broken. I can pick up the choc and marshmallow mix with a hint of sunscreeny coconut, but thats about it sadly. Its such a faint scent that it disappears within the hour. I've tried spraying on my skin and clothes and unfortunately it just doesn't last. In saying that it would be a good layering perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2172035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2172035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170858" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="angagu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2051805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="angagu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051805">angagu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get the fluffy marshmallow, cocoa powder, and candied ginger. It’s gourmand but still has a perfumey touch. You really have to overspray if you want any sort of scent bubble or longevity though. There’s also something like an emptiness/sheerness to this? So idk… it’s affordable but just underwhelming</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2170858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2170858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anmol96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1390282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anmol96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Fantasy-600.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.600.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fantasy"title="Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390282">Anmol96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 14:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m sorry but this perfume is a no from me, I was super hyped to try it as I watched lots of reviews so I went to my local store to test it out. It does smell nice but it’s not a good nice, it’s just meh nice but after a while the smell gets overpowering and I’ve started to get a headache. I’m glad I didn’t blind buy this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2170582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2170582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170431" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="birdieAngel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1878416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="birdieAngel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mix-Bar/Cloud-Musk-66231.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66231.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud Musk"title="Cloud Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170431ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170431" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878416">birdieAngel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 12:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's very nice, yet a little too synthetic for me. I believe the cheap scent comes from the coconut, which reminds me of sunscreen. Nonetheless, i get a layer of white chocolate like Jessica Simpsons signature. Generally a safe blind buy if you prefer sweet lactonic scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2170431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2170431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170096" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jadelouisa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006495"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2006495.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jadelouisa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/L-Interdit-Eau-de-Parfum-Rouge-Ultime-83865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime"title="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006495">jadelouisa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 06:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite perfumes EVER!!! I'm a huge vanilla girly when it comes to fragrances, and this is a vanilla dream. Marshmallow, sugar, candied ginger and a hint of chocolate, it's simply amazing. I've gotten so so so many compliments with this perfume. I nearly ran out of my first big bottle (75ml), and i had to get a second bottle, for when this one runs out :,)<br />
The only downside about this perfume is that the bottle isn't amazing quality. Sure, it's cute. It looks like a pink chocolate bar, but the color chips away quite easily.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2170096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2170096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167976" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sda11489"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1043622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sda11489" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-75668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe"title="Prada Paradoxe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043622">sda11489</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 20:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a pretty, light, easy to wear perfume that I feel could suit any occasion or time of year. I was nervous at first that this would be too sweet to wear in warm weather, but it’s not at all. On my skin, it’s more powdery fresh than sugary sweet. It reminds me of Jessica Simpson Fancy Love but slightly sweeter. The sillage isn’t powerful, and it sits pretty close to the skin but still gets compliments from those who are close to you, and the lasting power is 3-4 hours. Overall, this is an easy reach for an everyday perfume and in my opinion is a very good choice for a sweeter scent to wear in warm weather as well as colder weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2167976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2167976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colagurrrl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1488304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1488304.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="colagurrrl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Eau-de-Parfum-2021-68905.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68905.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Eau de Parfum (2021)"title="Miss Dior Eau de Parfum (2021)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1488304">colagurrrl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is cozy marshmallow heaven! Ever since the rise of Ariana Grande's fragrance line in the 2010s, I have grown obsessed with marshmallow notes in fragrances; Sweet Tooth is no exception to that! This perfume is a perfect blend of chocolate and vanilla goodness with a sugar rush of marshmallow, mellowed out splendidly by the coconut milk and musk. Despite it being a warm late spring as I write this review, I still find myself reaching for this perfume frequently. It is SO sweet and inoffensive to many noses that I feel this is an excellent choice for most days and nights. I do wish this fragrance had a better longevity, though. I feel like after 3-4 hours, I need to really look for the scent. With all of that said, Sweet Tooth remains an incredible celebrity fragrance and I would highly recommend this perfume to gourmand lovers! Can't wait to smell the Caramel Dream flanker next!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2167667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2167667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't agree that it is a "not too sweet" sweet scent that can be worn everyday. Because of how powdery this perfume is I had to return it but there is definitely an audience for this! I wanna say this is not even for the tweens because of how powdery it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2166059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2166059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The chocolate, marshamallow, vanilla, sugar and whipped cream makes this the sweetest fragrance. I literally wanna eat this! And the coconut actually makes this the perfect gourmand for summer! I wish it would last longer tho (like forever)… But I’m so pleased with this blind buy! I will mourn the day my bottle runs out.<br />
EDIT:<br />
The lasting power is shit. I still really love it though…<br />
EDIT:<br />
I really like to pair this with YSL Libre to give it more depth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2165593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2165593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="berrymilktea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1854317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="berrymilktea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854317">berrymilktea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, airy, easy going and cute design. Simple so it's versatile. <br />
Good for layering.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2162525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2162525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2157446" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CyanM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2088532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CyanM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-28-52616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla 28"title="Vanilla 28"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2157446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2157446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088532">CyanM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 20:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice, well-balanced sweetie gourmand. It's more powdery than I like, but the sugar and vanilla are balanced enough with other notes that it's not solely a sugar bomb. (It IS a sugar bomb! Just one with something interesting enough going on underneath all the sugar.) Longevity is pretty good, projection is more than arm's length but not much more.<br />
<br />
Impressions over time: On initial spray, it's mostly just marshmallowy sweetness, no ginger or chocolate. After fifteen minutes it smells like sugar with a hint of vanilla and maybe a bit of chocolate, at least if I'm looking for it. Thirty minutes in, I get sugar (well, "undifferentiated sweetness") and vanilla. At forty-five minutes it's similar, but has started getting powdery. After an hour and a half it just smells delicious—just a bit powdery, which I don't love, but like vanilla and sugar and maybe a little bit lactonic. The dry-down after that is progressively more powdery, but otherwise unchanged.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2157446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2157446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2155650" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evemzn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1941837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="evemzn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2155650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2155650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941837">evemzn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-14">05/14/24 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this was my first ever blind buy, id say im pretty pleased with it. i cant really identify much other than slightly chocolatey, slightly vanilla sweetness which could be my unrefined nose but to me the scent is just this ambiguous sweetness. having said that it's actually not too sweet or cloying which i like. however it is very powdery, in fact i think this perfume can be summed up in two words: powdery and sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153929" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="poppyetpear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288412"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1288412.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="poppyetpear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153929ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153929" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); At first there was a weird plastic note that was off putting, but I kept reaching for it. After a couple weeks I don't get that plasticky note at all. This is just so sweet, creamy and comforting. I have the perfume and body spray. Both project nicely and I get lots of compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2153929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2153929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153812" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="powderdonuts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2000489.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="powderdonuts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000489">powderdonuts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>blind buy! i went in expecting something gourmand, marshmallowy, vanilla-y, but i really didn’t get any of that at any point wearing it (my mom has a much more sophisticated nose than me, and she didn’t either). this is very verrrry predominantly powdery, like a baby powder almost. but i do like that a lot! it’s sweet and innocent and youthful which is all my jam. maybe i would have preferred the marshmallow but i like it for what it is on me!<br />
<br />
projection unfortunately isn’t super great and neither is longevity, but you can improve both by using unscented lotion where you apply (my favorite for this is o’keeffe’s working hands, it’s amazing). too much of a noob still to try layering but i bet this can make something really special!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2151899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2151899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151828" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ollieallennn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2112044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2112044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ollieallennn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2112044">ollieallennn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally went through with getting this after scouring reviews and I’m not disappointed at all! Inoffensive and pleasant to wear, smells very similar to Fresh Cream and Warm Cashmere by Philosophy with a sweeter twinge. Very marshmallowy, my only complaint is it doesn’t project a lot, but I do still smell it on myself after a few hours. Very cheap for the value, I got mine for 28 bucks at Walmart. I was torn between this and its caramel counterpart but I’m honestly thinking about getting both.<br />
I’m not really picking up on the floral/bergamot notes— I don’t think it’s very complex in terms of smell. Just sweet and yummy!! If you’re a lover of gourmands this is definitely a safe blind buy. I honestly might roll with this instead of Fresh Cream just because they’re so similar in smell and it’s cheaper. &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2151828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2151828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1409822">Rhiannandb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like fresh cream warm cashmere but sweeter , only thing different is on the dry down with sweet tooth I'm getting some pear like the pear from God is a women but toned down and buried in that vanilla marshmallow .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2147589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2147589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146623" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hayley.swts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122165"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hayley.swts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122165">hayley.swts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a blind buy for me, I looked up the notes &amp; it’s right up my ally, I love vanilla &amp; marshmallows. And it’s exactly as described. I wouldn’t say it’s anything unique, it smells like philosophy’s fresh cream, bbw vanilla sugar and the bbw easter bunny marshmallow daffodil daydream. It would be great for layering for that marshmallow whip cream scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2146623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2146623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145200" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icerise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icerise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145200ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145200" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214">icerise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 02:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree about the initial burst being mostly alcohol, and it becomes evidently a lower-tier fragrance because of it (it could burn your nostrils).  If you can get past that, and the Centrum multi-vitamin middle notes, the dry down is an absolute yummy treasure.  It’s so cozy and I can’t stop sniffing myself.  Unfortunately, that’s the problem—only I can smell me.  The sillage is not strong on this one, but if you don’t care much about turning heads, then go for it.  I find that I had to spray about four times to get the most of it, but it doesn’t seem to last long, either.  In spite of all the cons, I’m in love with it.  It’s sugary but restrained, and it’s so fun to spray on because the bottle is playful and nostalgic for me.  Moreover, it has an understated sophistication about it.  I would buy another bottle.  Oh, and last, I do agree with one of the reviews about it smelling like B&amp;BW Warm Vanilla Sugar (which is my body wash), but it’s more muted and delicate, and sweetly intimate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2145200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2145200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144776" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heartbeam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2119696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heartbeam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Vanilla-Suede-96257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Suede"title="Vanilla Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119696">heartbeam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 14:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m really picky when it comes to my gourmands (I find most to be cloying), but this one is so delicious. I hate ginger but it surprisingly doesn’t bother me in this fragrance. I guess my one gripe is that it doesn’t last very long on my skin, but overspraying isn’t too much of an issue with how affordable it is! The alcohol is really strong at the start too, so you can't enjoy the top notes without offending your nose for a few seconds.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2144776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2144776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949379">sezbez124</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got my hands on this and I have some thoughts. Initial spray can be pretty alcoholy, which is a bit sad that I don't really get any of the opening notes, and it just goes straight to the base notes for me. The main note that comes up on my skin is the ginger and the musk. Don't get me wrong, it smells really good, I actually quite like it, but I was underwhelmed with the sweetness. This will probably be a perfume I reach for when I can't make up my mind, as it seems quite crowd pleasing and suitable for most occasions :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
