padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aj_c19"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2111474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aj_c19" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111474">aj_c19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 23:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume! The second you spray it the bergamot and ginger notes hit you, but then it quickly dries down to a beautiful sweet chocolate marshmallow smell. My only complaint is that I wish it was longer lasting on skin, personally mine lasted for about an hour and a half.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2137651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2137651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137292" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moncheriecherry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1850824"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1850824.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moncheriecherry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1850824">Moncheriecherry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious fluffy marshmallow scent.🧁🍫🥥 This is one for the gourmand girls who enjoy an edible scent—very sweet at first, initially delivering a lot of the chocolatey marshmallow notes, however it doesn’t last very long &amp; dries down to a less complex sugary vanilla scent. For the price-point, it’s worth a purchase. This was a blind buy I certainly don’t regret. I plan on experimenting/layering this scent. Overall, would recommend. ♡</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2137292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2137292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moniquesl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733273"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733273.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moniquesl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733273">Moniquesl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I see a dozen notes listed, but that sounds pretentious for what it is. It is simple and delightful and feminine. Girly. Sweet sugar-coated marshmallows. A hint of white chocolate. Fresh and light. Nothing complex; just like-for-like. You will smell. Like. Candy. Soft and sweet and creamy. You will smell like the colour Baby Pink.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2137067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2137067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135805" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="a_chartrand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2097643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2097643.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="a_chartrand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2097643">a_chartrand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I have mixed thoughts on this which are mostly for my own reasons. I love the opening its fresh yummy and inviting....sweet but not cloying (although close). My issues come with the dry down, the other comments are correct the dry down is 100% B&amp;BW Warm Vanilla Sugar. Now this could be a nice nostalgic thing for you or....not. Sadly for me when I smell that I'm reminded of the smokers in high school and college who would douse themselves in WVS to cover up the smell....which turned into a smoky, BO like warm vanilla. I can't seem to get over that scent memory. I wish the opening lasted longer because the dry down does seem to linger, although not enough to be a scrubber. It was gone by morning. I'm wondering if I can get around the dry down my layering with something with a strong yummy dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2135805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2135805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambermochi222"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2105830.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambermochi222" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105830">ambermochi222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am in love with this perfume. it's such a good gourmand scent. To me it smells more like cookies or smores. I saw a lot of reviews about the ginger smell being too strong but to me I didn't smell much of that. I also saw reviews about it not being long lasting but it lasts so long for me! My boyfriend always notices when I wear this scent. Another great aspect is how affordable it is, $30 for how long lasting and good it smells; you can't beat it. Will buy again when I run out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2133892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2133892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133859" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FrostedNightshade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2012151"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2012151.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FrostedNightshade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pacifica/Indian-Coconut-Nectar-90391.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90391.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Indian Coconut Nectar"title="Indian Coconut Nectar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2012151">FrostedNightshade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 10:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the better cheapies on the market. Imagine a fluffy, powdery marshmallow with a hint of vanilla, highlighted by the freshness of bergamot and ginger. It definitely resembles Warm Vanilla Sugar, but also has a touch of something brighter that reminds me of AG's Sweet Like Candy. It does have a gourmand quality to it, but I find that it also has a particularly "perfumey" vibe that balances things a bit. I get quite a few compliments on this one.<br />
<br />
Nonetheless, Sweet Tooth has its issues. For one, it's pretty weak to the point where it seems more like an EDT than an EDP. Longevity on skin is very weak; it fades within 40 minutes for me. On clothes it lasts a bit longer, but projection stops very quickly. I honestly can't smell it at all half the time, and it's hard to tell if I'm noseblind or if it's truly that weak. The bottle is also a bit annoying; the plastic lid is a slightly different color of pink compared to the glass bottle, which is a small detail... but it drives me absolutely insane. It's also a bit awkward to hold, but that isn't as much of a bother. I actually really like the chocolate bar shape, its cute in a kitschy way.<br />
<br />
Honestly, I'll just get the body mist if I decide to repurchase. It smells the same (a bit more marshmallow-y) and lasts nearly as long, but is 1/3 the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2133859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2133859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kristinrob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658339"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1658339.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kristinrob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Tease-Eau-de-Parfum-2020-64012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tease Eau de Parfum 2020"title="Tease Eau de Parfum 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658339">kristinrob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>at first spray i couldn't believe this was the perfume that's getting so much hype online. the ginger was so sharp on the initial spray and i barely smelled any marshmallow or vanilla.<br />
<br />
but i'm so glad i gave it another shot. <br />
<br />
the dry down is so addicting. it definitely smells like a more sophisticated version of warm vanilla sugar from bbw. i actually don't like philosophy fresh cream so i can't speak on comparison.... that perfume feels too thick and gives me a headache. whereas sweet tooth actually feels a tad fresher thanks to the bergamot and the ginger (which i previously disliked, i found an appreciate for the note.) <br />
<br />
i just wish it projected more. it sits so close to the skin i have to put my wrist up to my nose to smell it. i might try overspraying... i was scared to do so previously because of that ginger scent. <br />
<br />
i also don't think i would pay full price for this. i got mine for $25 for the 2.5 oz from tj maxx.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2132759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2132759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131992" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dolly.Ribbons"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2105252.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dolly.Ribbons" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105252">Dolly.Ribbons</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 18:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My mom first got this for me for Christmas because I had been wanting it for a while. My first reaction was that it smelled pretty gingery After letting it sit for a couple of days after spraying And chocolate and milky whipped cream notes really shined. After I ran out of my first bottle which it lasted me from December until April, I got a second one because it was so good I needed more I think this is amazing for layering (I like to use the choco musk roller with it) This is incredibly delicious and sweet, but not overwhelmingly sweet like pink sugar It is so feminine and airy I am always complemented when I am wearing this. Moderate lasting on me I would say it’s strong because after I hang out with anyone, they say, they smell like my perfume On me it lasts for 3 to 5 hours. I will be purchasing the bigger version once I run out of this one i absolutely Love this perfume it’s so me🤍 it’s perfect if you want to give off light feminine, milkshake, girly, marshmallow vibes. It also kind of smells like like Horchata</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2131992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2131992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131971" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chloepeeters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2102605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2102605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chloepeeters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2102605">Chloepeeters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 17:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A blind buy 🫣 Don't get me wrong, I love the concept of this perfume. The vanilla combined with the marshmallows with a hint of spiciness from the ginger would all be PERFECT if only it lasted more than 10 minutes on my skin 🥲. I also bought the body mist version on a whim in hope I could layer it with the perfume to make it last longer but no luck. I get slighter longer on clothes lasting around 1-2 hours. The price is cheap enough, the perfume retails at around £35 for 70ml and £10 for a 220ml body mist. Unlikely repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2131971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2131971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131185" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rchldvsn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005387"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rchldvsn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison"title="Hypnotic Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmeliaLara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1789367.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmeliaLara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789367">AmeliaLara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 23:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is fine for the demographic it’s aimed at, doesn’t last all that long but has a pleasant sweet gourmand smell that’s a bit too synthetic for my taste. I would save up your money and splurge on something like love don’t be shy if you’re in the market for a sweet scent though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2130125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2130125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Futonbean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415783"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415783.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Futonbean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oscar-de-la-Renta/New-York-96887.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96887.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New York"title="New York"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415783">Futonbean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel like hate is a strong word, but I reallly dislike this perfume, to the point where I don't even use it as a bathroom spray. Based off the reviews, I was expecting a succulent, mouthwatering gourmand, but instead I got hit with the most screechy, synthetic, microplastic smell ever. I truly do not get any of the notes it is listing. It makes warm vanilla sugar from BBW seem like a luxury gourmand with elevated notes. It is nausea inducing for me. The first time I wore it, I got nauseous and a bad headache. I keep the bottle because it is cute, but I plan on giving it to my little cousin next time she comes to visit me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2127572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2127572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It reminds me of a hot white chocolate drink with whipped cream. It's a warm, welcoming, comforting smell; however, it doesn't last long. I would pair it with a lotion to help with the sillage, something with similar notes because the scent was gone within an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125903" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miriamcarothers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1094277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miriamcarothers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125903ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125903" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094277">miriamcarothers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Found this for $24.99 at Marshall’s and honestly it’s worth $10 max and behaves like a wispy body spray. <br />
Lasts about 30 min max. I mainly get a faint, powdery sweet musk. <br />
Cheap bottle seems like it was originally of the mold for an eyeshadow palette repurposed as an awkward perfume bottle. <br />
Good gift for a 11 year old tho. I think this would please the pre-teen demo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2125903"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2125903#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123790" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maddieonline"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1719117"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1719117.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maddieonline" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123790ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123790" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1719117">maddieonline</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so, so cute - however, it isn't as sugary as I expected and I would actually say this is more in the 'fruity-floral' category. Maybe it's the coconut and the jasmine, but it's a creamy, sweet and bright scent to me. The projection is good and it lasts a good 6-7 hours, so it's great quality especially at this price point. It doesn't smell synthetic (and I do absolutely love the bottle.) Really safe blind buy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2123790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2123790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123508" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AncientModernAncient"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AncientModernAncient" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/DKNY-Be-Tempted-39240.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39240.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="DKNY Be Tempted"title="DKNY Be Tempted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123508ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123508" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815719">AncientModernAncient</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My next in my journey of admitting to myself I love sweet scents after years of pretending I don't.<br />
<br />
I really love this! Tbh, I was worried it would be juvenile but it's not at all, and it's not as gourmand as I was expecting either. I get citrus for about a second on spraying and then it's marshmallow and vanilla for a while - the chocolate takes a little while to come through, and mixes well with with the jasmine. On me, it lasted through a shower, although it doesn't have major sillage.<br />
<br />
This is a perfectly safe blind buy for sweet lovers, and I can't imagine this offending anyone. I smell so delicious and always get compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2123508"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2123508#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122151" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sneggley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959291"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1959291.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sneggley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122151ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122151" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959291">Sneggley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 02:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very soft, sweet, slightly musky, effeminate/feminine, super cute gourmand perfume. <br />
       It was given to me as a gift, and immediately after I sprayed it I smelled strong notes of marshmallow and cream, and the slightest bit of citrus which faded quickly. And as I've worn it out more I've noticed the candied ginger is a very forward top note.<br />
       As the scent matures, the vanilla, chocolate, musk, and overall sweetness makes this warm, kinda sexy hot chocolate accord, but that could just be how it smells on my skin. I prefer it in warm weather or with body heat, but most prefer cold.<br />
       I do wish the projection and sillage were better, but it has a good atomizer and a bottle that I'm keeping long after the perfume is gone. The longevity is pretty moderate.<br />
       The lid is a different texture than the part that contains the perfume, more some kind of soft plastic material while the bottle is a kind of glass texture, which I don't care about at all, but is noticeable.<br />
       For around $30, I think it's very affordable and a safe blind buy as long as you enjoy sweet, cute dessert-esque scents. It quickly became one of my favorite fragrances, and smelled almost exactly as expected.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2122151"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2122151#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120698" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Princessy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416040.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Princessy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120698ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120698" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416040">Princessy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Marshmallow lover dream ! <br />
<br />
The best image to describe the scent is a ginger spiced white chocolate latte with melted marshmallow and whipped cream on top. It's a feel-good perfume that I love to wear to comfort myself or sometimes to bed. Imagine a day when you have the chance to enjoy the rain inside, watching some shows under you blanket. <br />
<br />
The projection is moderate as I gave you a nice scent bubble but it lasts pretty long on my skin. When I apply it before bed, I can still smell it in the morning.<br />
<br />
If you love Princess from Kilian you will love this one. They are not similar at all, but they give the same feeling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2120698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2120698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="myadkov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/540034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.540034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="myadkov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/The-Ghost-In-The-Shell-69412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Ghost In The Shell"title="The Ghost In The Shell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/540034">myadkov</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am surprised how much I like this. Although the only notes I can get are white chocolate, coconut and whipped cream. Probably because I am a sucker for white chocolate but I’ve always imagined such a sent would be terribly artificial and repulsive. That’s not the case with this perfume though, it’s outstandingly delicious. Wish it was longer-lasting, but considering its price there is nothing to complain about. I think this is as good as a celebrity perfume gets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2118622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2118622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Niche, designer, celebrity - you name it, I have worn it, and none of them have I received as many compliments than with this scent. Men, women, heck even children have said I smell good with this! Its such a simple scent too, kind of like a vanilla coconut milkshake. I usually can't smell it on myself but I always get compliments. Honestly one of my top perfumes for life!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2116107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2116107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; milk chocolate it smells like an expensive candy bar! another way i would describe it: chocolate sunscreen. i’m definitely picking up on the coconut milk note!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2115809"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2115809#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114974" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PollyP123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1509532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PollyP123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Milk-70012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk +"title="Milk +"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509532">PollyP123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 05:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had some loyalty points to use up so thought I’d give this a go after hearing some hype. On my skin this is really strong, very spicy and gingery and not as sweet as I’d expected. I definitely got this at the wrong time of year (it’s spring now) but think this would be amazing around autumn and winter, it reminds me of Christmas scented candles. <br />
<br />
It’s screaming to me to try in some layering combos, I think adding something nutty or woody would be incredible for colder months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2114974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2114974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109093" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BelleBella82"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2077890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2077890.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BelleBella82" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109093ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109093" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2077890">BelleBella82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the gourmand of my dreams..<br />
<br />
Fluffy vanilla, marshmallow, white chocolate, coconut milk and whipped cream deliciousness. <br />
<br />
I also own Philosophy Fresh Cream Warm Cashmere. I think there are some similarities, but Fresh Cream Warm Cashmere is much woodier. Plus, it lacks the candied ginger component that's present in Sweet Tooth. <br />
<br />
This is not a super edible, super sweet gourmand. <br />
<br />
It's more of a fresh, wearable gourmand; similar in its sweetness and gourmand-ness to Kayali Yum Pistachio. Therefore, it's wearable year-round, in my opinion. <br />
<br />
It doesn't last as long as I'd like, but evidently, it lasts and projects enough, because I received the most enthusiastic compliment of my life while wearing this the other day. <br />
<br />
This is perfection in a bottle. I have 2 backups. (⁠●⁠♡⁠∀⁠♡⁠)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2109093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2109093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108976" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nataliemarie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/273464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.273464.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nataliemarie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Thomas-Kosmala/Apres-l-Amour-53742.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53742.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Après l’Amour"title="Après l’Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/273464">Nataliemarie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 12:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I own a lot of these smell alikes up there. It does NOT smell like Choco Musk. It DOES smell very similar to the Cozy Fireside S'more bottle you can get at Walmart, which is a dupe of the one from BBW &amp; both are sprays that smell like a light version of By the Fireplace. I really don't get chocolate. BUT, I have some CHOCOlate Heavy perfumes, maybe that's why. Who Remembers Auqolina Chocolovers?? Mmmm HMMMM. Now that is kinda similar to Choco Musk.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2108976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2108976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108435" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I was so exited to try this.  Reminds me of amber romance by VS or some vanilla scent from BBW. Sweet and not as fresh as I hoped.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2108435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2108435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106478" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rezzmail"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370230"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370230.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rezzmail" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Scents-of-Wood/Praline-in-Maple-75894.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75894.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Praline in Maple"title="Praline in Maple"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370230">rezzmail</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 21:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I truly wish I was able to fully enjoy Sweet Tooth, but past the initial puff of chemically-plastic sugar; the perfume is more than subtle when that artificial smell is gone. <br />
<br />
It's an instant layering scent since it's nothing to write home about on it's own for me. <br />
<br />
It probably needs to macerate...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2106478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2106478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76824" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1703491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1703491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kristenkr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480754"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1480754.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kristenkr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/La-Perla/Possibilities-67573.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67573.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Possibilities"title="Possibilities"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1703491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1703491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480754">kristenkr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-06">12/06/22 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been trying to find an affordable dupe of Kilian's Princess for bedtime (in service of me not recklessly spraying through my entire 3.4oz bottle in one season), and I just might’ve hit the jackpot with Sweet Tooth! The initial burst of bergamot and candied ginger dusted atop a delectable cocoa marshmallow cloud reads so similarly to one of my (*sigh*) vastly more expensive signatures, I nearly jumped for joy. It's not a note-perfect match, nor is it an absolutely life-changing masterwork of niche perfumery or anything, but...who cares? Sometimes all you need is a scrumptiously comforting scent, housed in an adorable pink Lego chocolate bar of a bottle and sold at a price-point that'll allow you to happily overspray to your heart’s content.<br />
<br />
UPDATE #1: Boyfriend has officially branded this is the best in my collection, "even over the $300 ones" (!). He, like many men, only ever really compliments a handful of the bottles I’ve got, so I'm now ten times more excited about this purchase than I already was. Dare I say it might even become my new go-to?<br />
<br />
UPDATE #2: Purchased the Fresh Cream Warm Cashmere body lotion and it layers *perfectly* with Sweet Tooth. The former's non-surprisingly more lactonic than the latter but, until Sabrina releases her own cream, it can't be beat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="1703491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=1703491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697164" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katie.means"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1432099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1432099.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katie.means" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marissa-Zappas/The-Sun-Card-71855.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71855.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Sun Card"title="The Sun Card"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1432099">katie.means</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-27">11/27/22 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I can smell is Warm Vanilla Sugar from BBW, definitely not an unpleasant scent for a gourmand lover but very one-dimensional. Sweet Tooth doesn't last very long on the skin but it's a lovely bedtime scent to layer with a vanilla body cream. I bought mine for $20 at Walgreens with coupons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="1697164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=1697164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IkaIkuw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1926389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IkaIkuw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1926389">IkaIkuw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-23">01/23/24 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a 34-year old woman, I've been trying recently to find some more mature scents, suitable for a person with a family, career and all this stuff. This resulted in a couple failed blind buys. Fortunately, I've bought Sweet Tooth along with them, and I guess I'll have to accept the fact that deep down I just want to smell like a fluffy sweet cloud of sugar.<br />
<br />
This is one of the best purely sweet scents I tried, soft and milky. No sharp notes, but it's not weak. Goes straight to my top 10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76824"comment_id="2039387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html?ccid=2039387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1734063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
